Projects

Realtor: Real-estate website

A React-based platform styled with Tailwind CSS and powered by Google Firebase. Featuring Leaflet for maps, Swiper for sliders, React Router for navigation, and React Toastify for notifications. With robust authentication, users can sign in via email/password or Google authentication. Easily add, edit, and manage property listings for sale or rent. Explore curated listings and engage with a user-friendly interface.

SmartBrain

Image Face Detection and Caption Generation app that has a Frontend using React.It uses image recognition and image caption generation API.It has its own server using Node.js and Express and has a Database as well (Postgress SQL).

See Live Source Code

AllinLAN

“AllinLAN” is a java based desktop application where Private Chat, GroupChat, FileSharing, Screen Sharing functionalities can be formed through LAN i.e Local Area Network.The working is divided between two Users, Secondary User which runs as a client and Primary User, which runs as the server in the network

Source code
